Given this political fundraising email, respond with the name of the committee in the disclaimer that begins with Paid for by but does not include Paid for by, the committee address or the treasurer name. If no committee is present, return "None". Do not include any other text, no yapping.
name: Charlie Kirk, Turning Point Action
email: info@conservativesdefendingfreedom.com
subject: Make your 2X gift for 7 Days to Save America
body: Chase 500,000+ BALLOTS in the MUST-WIN PRECINCTS ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏Fellow American, We are in the 7 DAYS that will determine the future ofAmerica. That's why Turning Point Action is going ALL OUT to CHASE 500,000+BALLOTS ... to recruit and train EVEN MORE patriotic volunteers to chase EVENMORE ballots ... and to sprint through the finish line of November 5th. FellowAmerican, will you make your most generous 2X gift of $20.24, $50, $100, $250,or even $500 to support Turning Point Action's 7 DAYS to SAVE AMERICA?Because this FINAL PUSH is so critically important, a special supporter willMATCH every dollar you give, up to $47,000 total, by MIDNIGHT on November 4.Make your 2X gift for 7 DAYS to SAVE AMERICA >> Thanks to generous patriotslike YOU, Turning Point Action built the FIRST and BIGGEST ballot-chasingoperation on the Right: CHASE THE VOTE. Now -- in these 7 DAYS to SAVE AMERICA-- it's time to go ALL OUT to CHASE THE VOTE and WIN BIG! Your gift today willhelp Turning Point Action: * do ALL WE CAN with Turning Point Action's FULL-TIME BALLOT CHASERS so we chase 500,000+ BALLOTS in the MUST-WIN PRECINCTSthat could determine the 2024 Election, * train our FINAL of PATRIOTICVOLUNTEERS to help CHASE THE VOTE, as we ask volunteers to CHASE 100 VOTESduring early voting and CHASE 100 VOTES on Election Day, and * go ALL OUT sowe know that we did EVERYTHING we could to CHASE THE VOTE, WIN BIG, and SAVEAMERICA! Will you make your 2X gift of $20.24, $50, $100, or $250 to helpTurning Point Action CHASE THE VOTE during these 7 DAYS to SAVE AMERICA? Yourgift before MIDNIGHT on Monday, November 4 will have TWICE the impact and goTWICE as far, thanks to a special Turning Point Action supporter who willmatch every dollar up to $47,000 total. Make your 2X gift for 7 DAYS to SAVEAMERICA >> I promised you that no one would work harder or do more to SAVEAMERICA this year than Turning Point Action. And during these 7 DAYS to SAVEAMERICA, our team is working around the clock to deliver on that promise. Tostand with Turning Point Action, please make your most generous 2X gift rightaway. Thank YOU for everything you're doing for our country's future in thisall-important year. Onward! Charlie Kirk Founder Turning Point Action SupportTurning Point Action PAID FOR BY TURNING POINT ACTION (TPACTION.COM) AND NOTAUTHORIZED BY ANY CANDIDATE OR CANDIDATE'S COMMITTEE 4930 East Beverly RoadPhoenix, Arizona 85044 Unsubscribe
